name: Wizard of the Night (working title)
description:
Wizard of the Night is a top down dungeon crawler developed in Unity. In this game, you play as Curtis Johnson: a recently laid off wizard librarian. In order to supplement his income and pay his rent, he decides to enter a dungeon to loot the treasure within.. if the monsters don't chase him out.

Controls: WASD to move, IJKL to shoot. Hold shift to move faster
